Text: Great movie. Thanks, My Dad will love this.

Good picture but playback not so, Duplicate frames cause noticeable jumping or shuddering effect during scenes with camera panning.
Film is still very watchable, just gets on your nerves a little.

I watched this on a very large CRT Sony PAL TV and did not notice the judder you mention, winobie.  Could you give me an example of a scene which has the problem?  Also, what type of TV/DVD setup do you have?  Are you in the UK or US?
